thread.title: Filipino classic indie films to be screened at Singapore Intl Film Festival
thread.title_full: Filipino classic indie films to be screened at Singapore Intl Film Festival

title: Filipino classic indie films to be screened at Singapore Intl Film Festival
text:
Filipino classic, indie films to be screened at Singapore Int'l Film Festival 
GMA News Friday 23rd October, 2015 
One of them will be competing for the Silver Screen Awards' Asian Feature Film Competition. After debuting and winning awards at the World Premieres Film Festival Philippines, An Kubo sa Kawayan by award winning writer and filmmaker Alvin Yapan will have its international premiere at the SGIFF....
